title: Tata Motors Group global wholesales down 11 pc at 3,04,189 units in Q2
description: Tata Motors announced an 11 percent drop in global wholesales, including Jaguar Land Rover, totaling 3,04,189 units in Q2 FY25. Passenger vehicles declined by 6 percent, while Jaguar Land Rover saw a 10 percent decrease. Commercial vehicle sales also fell by 19 percent compared to the same period last year.
